start.text: Do you know me? Of course you do. 'Cause I'm famous!
Don't get too close man. It's hard to pity a fool if you get too close.
Hey fool, this ain't no football game!

retreat.text: You a disgrace to the man race!
Fools went unpitied and jibba jabba went unchallenged!

engaged.text: You're gonna meet my friend pain!

need_help.text: I got no time for the jibba-jabba.

pursuing.text: It's time to get in da pool, 'cause you're goin' swimmin', fool!

running.text: I hate flying, so this had better be the last time I see yo cryin'!
It's time to run like a real man!

hull_90.text: Anger - use it, but don't lose it!

hull_50.text: Do it again sucker, and there's going to be trouble!

hull_30.text: I'm on a real short leash here, and I'm tired of your crazy rap!

overload.text: I ain't getting on no plane, Hannibal!
Where's the meat? This sandwich is full of weeds! I ain't eatin' nothing I don't understand!
